name: European Federation for Development of Civil Drones
memberOrga: all our member organisations are independent/private
goal:
Objective of the association:to contribute to the development of civil drones and its applications, and to favour and promote the training of drone pilots all over Europe. Among other objectives we aim:
-development of network of effective, professional and adherent members
-inform our members of European decisions and projects concerning civil drones
-coordinate information of every country
-establish contact between members in order to exchange skills concerning training of drone pilots, construction, maintenance and research and development of civil drones
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Audiovisual and Media, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Humanitarian Aid, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: we represent a new organisation that has recently been created, therefore we are going to follow the policy of the European Union regarding civil drones.
